required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A 12-Month Study of Lasmiditan (LY573144) Treatment in Children Aged 6 to 17 With Migraine
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 3, 12-Month, Open-Label Study of Lasmiditan in Pediatric Patients With Migraine - PIONEER-PEDS2

brief_summary.textblock: The reason for this 12-month, open-label study is to see if the study drug lasmiditan is safe and effective for the intermittent acute treatment of migraine in children aged 6 to 17. The study will last about 12 months and may include up to 7 visits.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) by Treated Migraine Attack
primary_outcome.description: Percentage of TEAEs by Treated Migraine Attack

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Discontinuations Due to Adverse Events (AEs)
primary_outcome.description: Percentage of Participants with Discontinuations Due to AEs

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Treated Attacks with Pain Freedom at 2 Hours
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of Treated Attacks with Pain Freedom at 2 Hours

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Treated Attacks with Pain Relief at 2 Hours
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of Treated Attacks with Pain Relief at 2 Hours

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Treated Attacks with MBS Freedom at 2 Hours
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of Treated Attacks with Most Bothersome Symptom (MBS) Freedom at 2 Hours

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participants must have completed study H8H-MC-LAHX (NCT03988088) or study H8H-MC-LAHV (NCT number to be determined)
- Participants must weigh at least 15 kilograms (kg)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participants must not be pregnant or nursing
- Participants must not have any acute, serious, or unstable medical condition
- Participants must not be actively suicidal or at significant risk for suicide, in the opinion of the investigator

overall_contact.last_name: There will be multiple sites in this clinical trial. 1-877-CTLILLY (1-877-285-4559)

link.description: A 12-Month Study of Lasmiditan (LY573144) Treatment in Children Aged 6 to 17 With Migraine (PIONEER-PEDS2)

patient_data.ipd_description: Anonymized individual patient level data will be provided in a secure access environment upon approval of a research proposal and a signed data sharing agreement.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Data are available 6 months after the primary publication and approval of the indication studied in the US and EU, whichever is later. Data will be indefinitely available for requesting.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: A research proposal must be approved by an independent review panel and researchers must sign a data sharing agreement.
